Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/Van Buren
ShortDescription: Southbound 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Ida B. Wells, Dearborn and Van Buren: due to, street blockage near State/Van Buren.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Ida B. Wells, Dearborn and Van Buren, due to street blockage near State/Van Buren.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
